post:
**[KMS-Hosting.com](https://www.kms-hosting.com)** offers hosting solutions from Shared Webhosting to Dedicated Servers since 2012. We operate our own hardware and Juniper based 10/40Gbit network (AS30823) within two datacenters in Frankfurt am Main, Germany.

Our dedicated servers are based on server hardware of HP Enterprise, Dell or Supermicro. Every server comes with our award winning Inhouse DDoS-Protection which is based on years of research and development, mitigating even complex attacks up on layer7 like http floods.

**Our features: **  
-Professional server hardware  
-Dedicated CPU and RAM   
-Fast local storage   
-DDoS-Protection included   
-Out of band IPMI / iLO access   
-Own ISO Images possible  
 -Automated Reinstallation of Debian and Ubuntu  
 -Dedicated 1Gbit connectivity  
 -Prepaid  
-No long term contracts   
-BGP Sessions possible  

**Network details: **  
ASN: AS30823  
 Looking Glass / Speedtest: [https://lg.combahton.net/](https://lg.combahton.net/)  
 Smokeping Latency Monitoring: [https://smokeping.combahton.net](https://smokeping.combahton.net)  


**Starting at 39,00€ per month:**  
-Dedicated Server
-Intel Xeon L5520 (8x 2,27GHz)  
-16GB DDR3 ECC Ram  
-1TB SATA HDD  
-1Gbit Dedicated Uplink  
-5TB Traffic included  
-DDoS-Protected  
-Location: Frankfurt am Main, Germany  

More details and offers are available on our webpage, see **[https://my.combahton.net/dedicated_stock.php](https://my.combahton.net/dedicated_stock.php)**

In case of open questions, just send us a mail to support@kms-hosting.com or contact us directly on lowendtalk. Thanks! :-)
